events.name: Ukraine Faces Russian Attacks as NATO and Poland Investigate Missile Crash
events.wd_label: Ukraine Faces Russian Attacks as NATO and Poland Investigate Missile Crash
events.wd_description: Ukraine faced renewed Russian attacks in the east as NATO and Poland concluded that a missile crash in Poland, which killed two people, was likely caused by a stray Ukrainian air defense missile.
events.description: Ukraine faced renewed Russian attacks in the east as NATO and Poland concluded that a missile crash in Poland, which killed two people, was likely caused by a stray Ukrainian air defense missile.

events.name: Russian Attacks in Eastern Ukraine
events.wd_description: Ukraine confirmed fierce attacks in the east by Russian forces, which were reinforced with troops withdrawn from Kherson, following intense strikes on civilian infrastructure.
events.description: Ukraine confirmed fierce attacks in the east by Russian forces, which were reinforced with troops withdrawn from Kherson, following intense strikes on civilian infrastructure.

events.name: Missile Crash in Poland
events.wd_description: A missile crash at a grain facility in Poland, near the Ukrainian border, killed two people, marking the first deadly extension of the war into NATO territory.
events.description: A missile crash at a grain facility in Poland, near the Ukrainian border, killed two people, marking the first deadly extension of the war into NATO territory.

events.name: NATO and Poland's Conclusion
events.wd_description: NATO and Poland concluded that the missile was likely a stray S-300 rocket fired by Ukraine's air defenses, with no evidence suggesting it was launched by Russia.
events.description: NATO and Poland concluded that the missile was likely a stray S-300 rocket fired by Ukraine's air defenses, with no evidence suggesting it was launched by Russia.

events.name: Ukrainian President Zelensky's Visit to the United States
events.wd_label: Ukrainian President Zelensky's Visit to the United States
events.wd_description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky visited the United States, urging Congress to see aid to Ukraine as an investment in democracy and securing additional military support, including a Patriot air defense system.
events.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky visited the United States, urging Congress to see aid to Ukraine as an investment in democracy and securing additional military support, including a Patriot air defense system.

events.name: Zelensky's Address to Congress
events.wd_description: During his visit to the United States, President Zelensky addressed Congress, emphasizing that aid to Ukraine is not charity but an investment in democracy and seeking continued support.
events.description: During his visit to the United States, President Zelensky addressed Congress, emphasizing that aid to Ukraine is not charity but an investment in democracy and seeking continued support.

events.name: New US Military Aid Package
events.wd_description: The United States announced an additional $1.85 billion in military aid to Ukraine, including a Patriot air defense system to bolster Ukraine's defense against Russian missiles.
events.description: The United States announced an additional $1.85 billion in military aid to Ukraine, including a Patriot air defense system to bolster Ukraine's defense against Russian missiles.

events.name: Concerns from US Republicans
events.wd_description: With Republicans set to take control of the House of Representatives, concerns have been raised about the cost of continued US assistance to Ukraine, which has totaled about $50 billion.
events.description: With Republicans set to take control of the House of Representatives, concerns have been raised about the cost of continued US assistance to Ukraine, which has totaled about $50 billion.

events.name: North Korean Missile Launch Over Japan
events.wd_label: North Korean Missile Launch Over Japan
events.wd_description: North Korea fired at least one ballistic missile over Japan, marking a potential escalation and the 23rd missile launch by North Korea this year.
events.description: North Korea fired at least one ballistic missile over Japan, marking a potential escalation and the 23rd missile launch by North Korea this year.

events.name: Missile Launch
events.wd_description: North Korea launched a ballistic missile over Japan, with the missile reportedly passing over the northern Japanese island of Hokkaido.
events.description: North Korea launched a ballistic missile over Japan, with the missile reportedly passing over the northern Japanese island of Hokkaido.

events.name: Japanese Government Response
events.wd_description: The Japanese government issued a warning to civilians to avoid suspicious objects and to report them to authorities, following the missile's trajectory over Japan.
events.description: The Japanese government issued a warning to civilians to avoid suspicious objects and to report them to authorities, following the missile's trajectory over Japan.

events.name: Regional Reactions
events.wd_description: The missile launch, confirmed by South Korea's Joint Chiefs of Staff, marked a rare event of a missile being fired over Japan, raising regional tensions.
events.description: The missile launch, confirmed by South Korea's Joint Chiefs of Staff, marked a rare event of a missile being fired over Japan, raising regional tensions.

events.name: Panasonic's Efforts in EV Battery Production and Sustainability
events.wd_label: Panasonic's Efforts in EV Battery Production and Sustainability
events.wd_description: Panasonic is investing in EV battery manufacturing facilities and partnering with Redwood Materials to create a local, circular supply chain to support sustainability and reduce costs and CO2 emissions.
events.description: Panasonic is investing in EV battery manufacturing facilities and partnering with Redwood Materials to create a local, circular supply chain to support sustainability and reduce costs and CO2 emissions.

events.name: Investment in Kansas Facility
events.wd_description: Panasonic announced a $4 billion investment in a potential EV battery manufacturing facility in Kansas to expand its production capacity.
events.description: Panasonic announced a $4 billion investment in a potential EV battery manufacturing facility in Kansas to expand its production capacity.

events.name: Partnership with Redwood Materials
events.wd_description: Panasonic is partnering with Redwood Materials to establish a closed-loop battery recycling and remanufacturing process, starting with recycling production scrap and progressing to full EV packs.
events.description: Panasonic is partnering with Redwood Materials to establish a closed-loop battery recycling and remanufacturing process, starting with recycling production scrap and progressing to full EV packs.

events.name: Panasonic GREEN IMPACT Initiative
events.wd_description: The initiative aims to reduce CO2 emissions across manufacturing, operations, and end-consumers, aligning with Panasonic's 2050 environmental vision.
events.description: The initiative aims to reduce CO2 emissions across manufacturing, operations, and end-consumers, aligning with Panasonic's 2050 environmental vision.

events.name: Call2Recycle Program
events.wd_description: Established in 1994, the program collects lithium-ion batteries from North American consumers and has recycled over 115 million pounds of batteries.
events.description: Established in 1994, the program collects lithium-ion batteries from North American consumers and has recycled over 115 million pounds of batteries.
